SELECT g.g_num, g.g_title, g.g_period, (g.g_period - SUM(MONTHS_BETWEEN(TO_DATE(lg.lg_edate), TO_DATE(lg.lg_sdate)))) remainingPeriod, g.g_to, (g.g_to - SUM(lg.lg_to)) remainingTo FROM game g, game_order go, learn_grp lg WHERE g.g_num = go.g_num AND g.g_num = lg.g_num AND go.m_num = #{mNum}
AND g.g_num = #{num}
AND g.g_title LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
GROUP BY g.g_num, g.g_title, g.g_period, g.g_to
ORDER BY g.g_title
ORDER BY remainingPeriod DESC
ORDER BY remainingTo DESC
